title: API key from settings not being used - defaults to local-dev-key
description: AIService is using 'local-dev-key' instead of the API key from settings. The saved key starts with 'sk-D***' but the error shows 'local-dev-key' is being used. Need to investigate where the settings API key should be read vs where 'local-dev-key' default is coming from.
close_reason: Fixed in commit - the apiKey getter now properly prioritizes the VS Code setting over environment variables. Also added .trim() to handle any whitespace issues.

title: Remove debug console logs from webview and PlanViewProvider
description:
Clean up console.log statements added for debugging the Open Settings button:

- webview.js: DOM element initialization logging
- webview.js: Open Settings button click logging  
- PlanViewProvider.ts: handleOpenSettings logging

Remove these once the feature is confirmed working.
